channel.title: Peter Goldring
channel.description: Recent news about Peter Goldring, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Edmonton Journal
item.description:
Edmonton MP challenges province's homeless statistics
A member of parliament from Edmonton is disputing homelessness numbers from a provincial government report dating back to 2008. Peter Goldring, MP for Edmonton East — who has worked on homelessness issues for 15 years and has written two books on the subject — claims the statistics are “ballooned, fictitious numbers that are meant to extract more government funding.” According to the 2008 Plan for Alberta, there are 11,000 homeless people living in the province. Of those, 3,000 are chronically homeless.

item.description:
Peter Goldring: Public needs better info on breathalyzers
